definitions.definition: A weight class in professional boxing between light middleweight or welterweight and super middleweight or cruiserweight ; a similar division in wrestling and other sports
A boxer who fights in this division; a similar wrestler etc
A class in between heavy and light .
An employee ranking anywhere between junior and senior .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A weight class in professional boxing between light middleweight or welterweight and super middleweight or cruiserweight ; a similar division in wrestling and other sports
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A boxer who fights in this division; a similar wrestler etc
( by extension ) A class in between heavy and light .
( countable , business , by extension ) An employee ranking anywhere between junior and senior .
